name: Polygonal Pong
description:
Polygonal Pong is a game based in the clasic pong.

You can play the game alone or with 3 more friends in the same pc. You dont need any joystick to play.

There are two game modes:

  • Basic Mode: You must try to not lose the ball. If the ball touches two times the wall you will die.
  • Dont touch the ball: You must evade the ball or you die. The ball has a possibility to clone self.

This game is under development. You can see the game development here.

Feel free to give me some (not destructive) feedback in the comments! :)

Enjoy it!
